arg.name: frame_id
arg.description: Sets imu output frame: imu_link; imu_reversed_link

arg.name: timer_period
arg.description: Sets node data update timer period in ms

arg.name: g
arg.description: Sets gravitational acceleration constant within the node

arg.name: AFS_SEL
arg.description: Sets accel scale setting to one of the modes: 0(+-2g) 1(+-4g) 2(+-8g) 3(+-16g)

arg.name: FS_SEL
arg.description: Sets gyro scale setting to one of the modes: 0(+-250) 1(+-500) 2(+-1000) 3(+-2000)
